item.title: Visions of Mana
item.description:
Title: Visions of Mana
Genre: Action , RPG
Developer: Square Enix
Publisher: Square Enix
Franchise: Mana Series
Release Date: Aug 29, 2024




About This Game

Visions of Mana is a brand new title in this series revolving around the sacred sword and mana.
The protagonist Val and his childhood friend Hinna, the newly appointed Alm of Fire, set off on a journey to the Mana Tree.

This game’s iconic vibrant and vast semi-open field contains adorable yet ferocious monsters, allowing you to enjoy swift three-dimensional battles using the power of the Elementals.
Through adventures with friends met along the way, they start to see the truth about the world.
Must we accept our fates?

A new “Mana” tale begins here as a classic fantasy series returns to its roots.

▸Bold graphics full of characteristic “Mana” flair
The characters journey across a vibrant world alive with spirits.

▸Exploring the world
Explore the vast, semi-open world that stretches as far as the eye can see. Traverse the environment quickly and safely with new companions, the “Pikuls".

▸Harness the power of the Elementals
In this game, you will fight enemies using weapons that house the power of the Elementals. Change between different classes and characters to suit your playstyle and enjoy combat that has evolved both three-dimensionally and strategically.

▸ Breathtaking and immersive soundtrack
Around 100 background music tracks by a talented team of creators who have worked on countless tracks throughout the series. The music in field areas feature interactive music, heightening the mood for adventure.
Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 64-bit
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i5-6400
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 580 / Intel® Arc™ A580 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB VRAM
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 45 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1920x1080, Graphics Preset "Low", 30FPS
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 64-bit
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 3500 / Intel® Core™ i5-8500
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 XT / Intel® Arc™ A580 / NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2070
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 45 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1920x1080, Graphics Preset "High", 60FPS

item.title: MEMORIAPOLIS
item.description:
Title: MEMORIAPOLIS
Genre: Indie , Simulation , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: 5PM Studio
Publisher: 5PM Studio
Release Date: Aug 29, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Aug 29, 2024




About This Game



  • From Antiquity to the Age of Enlightenment: lay the foundations of your city, experience critical moments in history and transform your city into the Capital of Capital!
  • Each Age introduces its own game mechanics, presenting a distinct set of opportunities and challenges for the player's dynasty to navigate.
  • Traces from one age can be integrated into the next one.



  • No need to worry about laying roads!
  • Thanks to our unique algorithm, overseen by an urban planner, you can create the most realistic-looking city you've ever seen in a video game!
  • Quarters, factions, Age transitions... Your choices will shape your town's future!



  • Your inhabitants will have needs and expectations. Rely on buildings such as farms, cutting camps and quarries to ensure the livelihood of your pioneers.
  • Use your creativity and strategic skills to manage administrative and political centers to interact with your population.
  • Take the Senatus for instance : once built, you can propose and fund decrees, which will impact your city for short periods!



  • Face historical events like the Black Death and manage internal events such as riots and strikes that could lead to losing the game!
  • Build wonders like the Great Library of Alexandria, Windsor Castle, the Leaning Tower of Pisa, the Palace of Versailles and more to showcase your wealth and power throughout the ages!
  • The culture you choose will impact your city and offer significant replayability. Will you choose to be a craftsman, the influence of a politician, the mind of a philosopher, or something else?

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

    Minimum:

    • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 6 GB available space
    • Sound Card:
    Recommended:

    • Processor: AMD RYZEN 7 5800 X or Intel equivalent
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVidia GTX 2070 or AMD equivalent
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 6 GB available space

item.title: Umamusume: Pretty Derby – Party Dash
item.description:
Title: Umamusume: Pretty Derby – Party Dash
Genre: Action
Developer: Cygames, Inc. , Arc System Works
Publisher: Cygames, Inc.
Release Date: Aug 29, 2024




About This Game

Includes:
・Umamusume: Pretty Derby – Party Dash Game

*Content details and specifications are subject to change without prior notice.
*Actual items may differ from the image shown.
*The "Umamusume: Pretty Derby" Item Set (Redeemable Code) is not included in the Steam® version.
*Please confirm the details regarding the included content before making a purchase.
*Please confirm the differences between each edition before making a purchase.

A colorful cast of pixel-art Umamusume are all in line and ready to compete in the Slapdash Grand Prix, a school festival featuring four zany events! Which team will run, shoot, and eat their way to gold and glory?

1. Featuring 25 Playable Pixel-Art Umamusume!
Each team consists of 5 Umamusume, and a total of 4 teams have their eyes on the gold at the Slapdash Grand Prix! Play the game to unlock up to a total of 25 playable Umamusume, and not even counting the curious onlookers scattered across the stages!

2. Challenge a Frenzy of Racers in 4 Different Fan Fest Events!
The Grand Prix is made up of 4 events: Hurtling Hurdles, Blazing Baskets, Dodgeball Demolition, and Gourmet Gauntlet. Select an Umamusume from your team for each event and aim for the gold, but be prepared for some wacky rules and hijinks!

3. Content Galore for One Player or More!
In addition to the story mode that explores each team's unique cast, you can also decorate with your favorite furniture and invite your Umamusume roster to hang out in the clubroom. After that, they can play matches in both local play or online play! The Umamusume are sure to keep your heart racing whether in Single or Multiplayer!

4. Embark on a Grand Adventure with Gold Ship!
Run to the ends of the earth and beyond in this single-player roguelike mode where you play as Gold Ship, who sets out on a perilous journey to rescue her friend from hordes of evil robots. Wield water guns, dodgeballs, and other weapons in your unique arsenal to survive as long as possible. The farther you go, the stronger the enemies you'll face, but the higher your chances of finding rare loot!



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 / 11
    • Processor: Intel Core i5 / i7
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX1650 / Radeon RX6400
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Requires a 16:9 resolution monitor for optimal performance.

item.title: Gori: Cuddly Carnage
item.description:
Title: Gori: Cuddly Carnage
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: Angry Demon Studio
Publisher: Wired Productions , CouchPlay Interactive (Greater China)
Franchise: Wired Productions
Release Date: Aug 29, 2024




About This Game




Humanity has been destroyed - and it's up to Gori, along with his deadly but wise-cracking sentient hoverboard, F.R.A.N.K, and morose A.I companion, CH1-P, to slay the evil Adorable Army with lethal combos.

Fuelled by insatiable demand, 'Cool-Toyz Inc.' created 'Ultra Pets'. The ultimate companions that never hunger, never require bathroom breaks and are impervious to the ravages of time. Little did anyone expect the mutation that transformed these perfect pets into twisted toys straight from your nightmares, hell-bent on wiping out mankind.

Master explosive weaponry and devastating combos in an epic battle to prevent the Adorable Army from conquering the galaxy, and rescue Professor Y, their missing creator and only human who showed Gori and his friends love. Push your combat and platforming skills to the limits as you fight your way through twisted landscapes filled with environmental hazards, razor-sharp adult humour and a bone-crunching, pulse-pounding soundtrack.


One of the last prototype synthetic pets, smuggled out of Cool-Toyz Inc before destruction, Gori is cute, cuddly, yet extremely deadly.




Save the galaxy with a team of the unlikeliest heroes, from F.R.A.N.K and CH1-P to a host of unexpected allies, with a script packed with heart and adult humour that’s as razor-sharp as F.R.A.N.K’s blades!




Battle the blood-thirsty hordes of the Adorable Army in fast-paced combat where your hoverboard is your weapon! Power slide, grind and spin to cause MAXIMUM carnage and high combo scores. Paint the town red with F.R.A.N.K’s blades as you slice and dice with gratuitous amounts of dismemberment - body horror and the most twisted toy designs you’ve ever seen!




This cat has claws… and a devastating arsenal of explosives, razor-sharp weaponry and unlockable moves to lay waste to the Adorable Army in the most brutal and stylish way possible! From neon-drenched city streets and toy factories awash with deadly toxins, to twisted carnivals and the insides of arcade machines - each level is filled with lethal environmental hazards and mutated toys to push your combat and platforming skills to their limits.

Use your extreme hoverboard parkour skills to explore every corner of the level for collectables that unlock radical new filters, outfits and fur-styles for Gori!




Skate and slay out to an original bone-crunching soundtrack, with 48 songs bursting with energy across multiple genres.



  • Play as a badass cat with a team of unlikely heroes
  • Battle blood-thirsty hordes of mutated toys
  • Explore multiple levels filled with lethal environmental hazards
  • Master a devastating arsenal of explosives, razor-sharp weaponry and unlockable moves
  • Use your extreme hoverboard parkour skills to explore every corner of the level for collectables
  • Turn the town red with F.R.A.N.K’s blades as you slice and dice
  • Skate and slay out to an original bone-crunching soundtrack

The game contains foul language, excessive gore, and other adult content! Enjoy!



Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The game contains semi-realistic, excessive gore and dismemberment. We're talking buckets of blood!



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i5 6th Gen or AMD Ryzen 3
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050, Intel Arc A380, AMD RX560
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 8 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i7 10th Gen or AMD Ryzen 5
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 2060, Intel Arc A750, AMD RX 5600xt
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 8 GB available space
